spell1.name: WIDOW'S BITE BATON
spell1.description: Strike with the enhanced electric batons.

spell2.name: RED ROOM RIFLE
spell2.description: Attack with the Red Room Rifle.

attributes.label: DAMAGE FALLOFF
attributes.value: Falloff begins at 10m, decreasing to 50% at 20m

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Shares the same magazine with Straight Shooter. Straight Shooter activates only after aiming down sights for a specific duration; otherwise, it will fire from the Red Room Rifle.⚬ While using Straight Shooter, the damage falloff is negated.

spell3.name: ELECTRO-PLASMA EXPLOSION
spell3.description: Switch the Red Room Rifle to Destruction mode and unleash an electro-plasma blast, damaging enemies within range and leaving plasma on the ground to Slow nearby enemies.

attributes.label: EXPLOSION RANGE
attributes.value: 5.6m - 8m (Maximum range is achieved after 0.6s of charging)

attributes.label: EXPLOSION DAMAGE
attributes.value: 120 - 170 (Maximum damage is achieved after 0.6s of charging)

attributes.label: NUMBER OF PLASMA GLOBULES
attributes.value: 7 - 20 (Maximum amount is achieved after 0.6s of charging)

attributes.label: FOLLOW-UP FIRE
attributes.value: Can shoot immediately after Ultimate ends

spell3.changeDescription: Slow 80% → 55% (nerf) and adds Vulnerability 15% for 4s (buff); New effect: can shoot immediately after using Ultimate; Team‑Ups: +Operation: Microchip (Punisher); −Allied Agents (Hawkeye)

spell4.name: FLEET FOOT
spell4.description: Dash forward with those fertile feet and enable a powerful jump.

spell5.name: EDGE DANCER
spell5.description: Unleash a spinning kick to Knock enemies airborne. Landing the hit will allow her to zip to the target with a grappling hook for a second kick.

attributes.label: FOLLOW-UP FIRE
attributes.value: Can shoot immediately after second kick

attributes.label: BUGFIX (2025‑07‑24)
attributes.value: Fixed aerial-launch case disrupting Edge Dancer multi-stage logic

spell5.changeDescription: Bugfix: multi‑stage logic after aerial launch (no numeric)

spell6.name: STRAIGHT SHOOTER
spell6.description: Switch the Red Room Rifle to Sniper mode to fire high-energy rounds.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Shares the same magazine with Red Room Rifle.
